Review.Titre: A Zebra cannot change its strips. See Update.
Review.Contenu: A little difficult getting someone on the phone.  However, this is the new world and the new way of doing business. My issue was quickly resolved with a few email exchanges. It was handled with professionalism and courtesy. I explained my situation and was met with complete understanding and an apology. I was offered several scenarios and it was left up to me as to which option would make me happy. As a customer, I couldn't ask for better customer service. It is refreshing to have a company go out of their way to make things right. I would purchase from them again without hesitation. Customer service, after the sale, is what matters and they have that in spades. Kudos to the entire team that assisted me.Update as of March 1, 2022.My account was cancelled due to exposing misleading Free Shipping promos.A Zebra cannot change it stripes. This holds true more than ever now. Several times,I called out Performance on their misleading Free Shipping promotion and was met with excuse after excuse as to why I didn't qualify. Future buyers beware and take notice of their Bait and Switch Tactics. Hoping that exposing them will lead to more transparency and everyone wins.

STOP!!  Don't order from this company.  Again, do NOT order from this company.  Placed an order for several items, one was the wrong size (the right size was listed on my invoice) and another item was defective upon arrival.  The only way they would replace either item was for me to pay the shipping to return the wrong & defective item.  They make their customers pay the shipping to return items they send in error and for defective parts. In addition to having to pay the return shipping cost, you have to wait until they receive and process the returned items before they ship the replacements to you.  If you need the item(s) right away you are out of luck.  I thought about ordering my defective/incorrect items from another company and just get a refund from Performance PC.  This way I could cut down the amount of time I had to wait by avoiding having to wait the time for my return shipping and their processing time.  However, if they issue a refund, even on items they shipped incorrectly and on defective parts, they charge you a 15% restocking fee. That’s right, when they make a mistake – they still charge you a 15% restocking fee.  Make you pay return shipping and make you wait an extra long time or pay a 15% restocking fee. This isn’t a company you should do business with – avoid them.  They have absolutely no concern for their customers and absolutely don’t treat their customers fairly.  Do NOT do business with them at any cost.  I’ll bet they will soon be out of business given their very poor customer policies.

The banner on your site "Free Shipping" is the size of a "Bulletin Board" and the "fine print" is 2 clicks away. Too many rules and policies that disqualify "Free Shipping". Your company can call it policies and sugar coat it but it is a "Bait and Switch" The main issue is that your website and cart show free shipping up until the last minute and only after the purchase is completed, is the overpriced shipping "slipped" in "after the fact "and added to the purchase. I hope other customers will see this and take notice. Perhaps then change will occur, with regard to the misleading nonsense, and be a bit more clear and straight forward. I would venture a guess that 99% of your sales DO NOT get Free Shipping because of your Bait and Switch "Policies".Update: Performance PCs cancelled my account because I went and wrote this review and exposed their Bait and Switch B.S. Their are other retailers that are offer legit perks to loyal customers.A threat of chargeback is more dancing around the real reason. You did not like my exposing the Free Shipping smoke show. All good. There is no shortage of other retailers. Consider modifying Website to be more transparent with your so called Free Shipping and everyone wins. Review.Titre: QD fitting leaked out of the box.
You Paid, Its NOT OUR PROBLEM NOW!
Review.Contenu: Product took longer than the guaranteed 3 to 5 days by USPS Priority Express International standard. USPS has no statement of suspension of money back guarantee for this service during Covid, with shipping from US to Canada. When asked to file for the money back due to the shipment taking over 15 days they refuse and give the base attitude of its not their problem. Overall Attitude makes me think they got the refund from USPS and pocketed it. I spent $57.65 USD to express ship the package to get the parts before school started in 3 weeks from the shipment. I will already be in school without the required gear. Never had a worse experience with an on line transaction, than i have had with this. Avoid this Store at all costs, because one you pay they couldn't care less where your package is, if you get it or not. Once you pay its your problem not theirs.Update Response to Performance PC's Reply: Yes you did have your rep contact USPS to further push the investigation into my package that had been marked as processed through international distribution facility with not further scans indicating it ever left as i found out when i, initiated the investigation process after USPS had the Package for 14 days on a 3 to 5 day shipping method. Now 19 days after USPS had the package and after I had to contact you to get you to reach out on the missing package; it finally shows up in Customs in Canada. I never said your company said the package wast your problem, but that is the attitude that your contact portrays when you say the suspension of certain parts of the shipping service guarantee are in effect and i can find no such information or warning from USPS to confirm that, even after dealing with a USPS representative on the phone.  The 15% discount you gave me on the order for this experience is appreciated but a drop in the bucket compared to the money spent on the shipping charges for a method that took over 3 times the maximum delivery date by method stated standards. I am not blaming Performance PC's for the short comings of USPS. I am blaming you for making me feel as if my desire to seek the money back function of the shipping method that USPS would only refund to the Shipper and not the Recipient was taken as a joke based on you hiding behind "all carriers are experiencing delays and all money back guarantees have been suspended since the beginning of the COVID outbreak" line used repeatedly. If i had been told that they were supposed to be suspended but you would process the request to USPS for me and see what they say i would have felt that Performance PC's appreciated and valued my business. The Discount code you gave me for my next future order with Performance PC's wont be used. As it sits right now i see no reason to place another order with your company. This experience has left a bad taste in my mouth and it will be a long time before i decide to give your company a chance at any repeat business.

The order number below is my one successful purchase with Performance PCs.  I picked up in person, and they even called me to make sure I would make it on time.  However, when I returned home, I found that my card had been charged twice, once for an authorization and once for the invoice, reducing my available funds to 0.  I wrote their cust. serv. and the response back was that the guy who handles that is out on vacation until next week, don't worry in a week it will come off of your card.  Well, I let that experience slide and decided to put another order together... Now I would like to share the email exchange I have had with one of their customer service reps: ME: "just tried to place an order but it was kicked back because of billing address issues, at least in your system, but my credit card shows it debited out of my account... it was all the money i had in the account, now I can't make the purchase.  Last order I made with your company had a similar issue where you debited my account twice and you did not get my moeny back for a week!  I hope that this issue resolves today..." THEM: "We dont debit anything. Those are authorizations with your credit card company and you have to talk to them about how they can release. It has nothing to do with us as we did not charge you." ME: "in order for them to release the authorization, you have to contact them to let them know the sale did not go through... here is Amscot's phone number: 1-866-532-9623 OR The system kicked back the payment because of the billing address, which I have just recently moved, so the thing is that I cannot reenter the billing address because the money I had loaded is now locked... I have just changed the address that amscot has on file, so if you were to rerun the order under the initial authorization would that work?  Amscot replied that you have 7 days to claim the authorization.  the previous billing address is as follows: XXXXXX XXXXX XXXX S. Kirkman Rd.  XXXX Orlando,  FL  XXXXX the new billing address is: (the one I entered on your site) XXXXXX XXXXX XXX One Center Blvd.  XXXX Altamonte Springs, FL  XXXXX Any alternative strategies you may have would be welcome. Thanks for you time," THEM: "We just do not have the time to do this, sorry." ME: "Thanks.  You have just lost a customer.  Your customer service is worthless and I intend to make it known on every forum I frequent and the BBB.  No reply necessary; all of your future correspondence will rot in my spam folder." THEM: "Grow up. BBB you don't even have an order ...lol" ME: "Ummm, I have credit card transaction records... which are more than enough.  Btw since your lol-ing, you may have never looked at your BBB score, but it sucks.  No wonder all the complaints seem to relate to your customer service.  Just to give you and Henry W. Baron a quick heads up, but your competition (FrozenCPU) has an A+ and your company has a C-.  The only reason I was doing business with you guys is because you are physically close to my location, in fact, my last order I picked up from your warehouse in person.  Are you Mr. Baron?  Do you think that he would be happy to read a transcript of this email exchange?  Do you think he may be able to figure out which one of his CSR's was responsible?" THEM: "' all of your future correspondence will rot in my spam folder.'  We cant reply to this because it is in the SPAM box too." I will be the first to admit, I got pretty angry, but since when is it ok for a CSR to essentially say ~eh, you don't have an order number so, up yours. After trying to patronize this store, I did not receive an order, I was out $150 for at least a week (we will see how fast amscot will default the authorization, but history tells me it will be a week), and I was treated by Cust.serv. like I was a joke and not worth their time.  I can just hope that someone may read this and decide to go to FrozenCPU or Xoxide instead.

I had then installed the water block on my GPU as anyone would but came to find that the GPU does not fit inside my case in any orientation with the waterblock attached. As a result I am unable to return it and I am just simply out the $340 that I had spent on the items. I know that their margins are probably razor thin but especially with water cooling trying to ensure everything fits at the time of purchase without even getting the product is hard so not being able to rectify any issues makes this seller a hard pass for me.

The address my most recent order is the correct address I live at and it did not deliver to the address and is now being returned to sender and does not allow me to change the delivery options and now have to wait another week to receive my order.

Additionally an item I wanted wasn't able to be put into cart due to a technical error, so they instructed me to add it as a misc items (which was not possible on my end). After about a week of trying to figure things out I was able to make part of my purchase... Probably won't ship here again.

The new site is still a bit buggy , I still can not check out with Amazon pay and none of the promo codes I get emailed are working. I have left additional notes when checking out and no one has responded. With the old site if a note was left in the additional note section I would receive a reply addressing any issue I was currently having.

You do have a great inventory and your cheaper than amazon on almost everything. But amazon gives me free shipping. I think my biggest complaint is the website. It is entirely too slow and on my iPhone the apply bottom for the filters is covered up and unusable. These are simple and cheap fixes and would really boost your sales. I would really love to see your business grow and secede. But when I tell people about your site I also add that it’s slower than Christmas.

Spent $40 shipping, got charged again another $25 at the door, and my package was missing one of the ordered items (mostly, mounting hardware that arrived with one bolt of four) and the order had a factory defect on another item (though not PPC's fault for the defect)Missing items or wrong items has happened to me before with PPC's. So far they have had a 100% failure rate over three orders (on several accounts over the last decade), where something was screwed up in them.As per usual, PPC's support is top quality, working quickly and efficiently to solve the issue, understand the issue immediately with no need to repeat myself, and always have made good on the issues, with no extra expense to the customer. They also have on two occasions of the three (that I know of) ensured the replacement was checked before being sent, which actually avoided an issue with a new factory-defective part being shipped in this order.I commend their support, but its a shame that I have had to go through them every single time I have ordered from PPC's. While it is a cost-free and painless experience, I am now three for three orders needing to contact support.

The fans I received were the exact style, but the 27mm thick varient. Now I must wait for them to reply to my email, take time out of my day to return the items, wait for them to receive it, then wait for my replacement to be shipped to me. Delay after delay after delay. Luckily I only use my computer for a hobby YouTube/Twitch/Podcast channel and I'm not losing a ton of money. I can only imagine if I was a working professional who desperately needed the parts. Hopefully they fix this, I've no doubt they will but they have yet to reply to my email. It's only been a few days though.

Review.Titre: The website seems to be riddled with…
Review.Contenu: The website seems to be riddled with problems. From being very slow to the whole checkout process. I was buying two vandal proof switches. The only payment option I was given was to check out with Amazon. OK, I am a Prime member so not that big of a problem. there are a lot of choices for shipping and I choose the least expensive via USPS and checked off the box. On the order total side of the screen my shipping preference came up and it said $0.00 charge. I thought it must be because I paid with Amazon my free shipping carried over. Nope. As soon as I confirmed payment A new total screen appeared and said I had just paid for the switches and over $14 to ship them. That was more than 50% of the price of my order.I immediately called Performance PC's toll free number and left a message with customer service to call me back. To their credit they did just a couple minutes later. I explained my problem and was told I did check the box for the more expensive shipping. I disagreed, and told the CS rep the first time I saw that shipping charge was after I placed my order. He then suggested that the price jumped to a more expensive method because the shipping choice I made was not available where I live. I said that's ridiculous. It's the US Post Office, it comes to the house every day. I was put on hold while he went to talk with the shipping manager. A minute or two later he returned and told me because I lived in a rural area (I don't) the post office charges more and the price jumped because they could not send this less than a pound package out for the  $6.70 the shopping cart calculated, because of course, the "rural" area I live in. The deal I was offered was they will have to mail out my switches in a bubble envelope (I thought that was how it would come anyway) and charge me $7.70 postage and then refund the difference. I agreed and we said goodbye.I have since looked this up and PPC's $7.70 shipping cost is about right. Had the website given that price I would have groused about the USPS but paid it and been on my way. To many people (myself included most of the time) Tennessee is rural and it could be that the Post Office does indeed charge more to deliver here, I feel the shipping calculator on anybody's website should be accurate and if not the merchant should honor that price. I have never agreed to pay for something and had the price jump after the deal was sealed.I have bought from Performance PC's in the past and never had a problem and I will use them again in the future I'm sure. If this had been my first experience though, I do not think I'd be back. The new site design maybe should have been beta tested a little more.

Review.Titre: it came damaged but useable i had to…
Review.Contenu: it came damaged but useable i had to put put it in my pc as i need to get my system up and running ASAP did not have time to wait on returns

Review.Titre: Product was well packaged and updates…
Review.Contenu: Product was well packaged and updates were give once it shipped.Took way too long for ppcs to actually ship the item out. I ordered early in the am and didn’t receive a shipping notification until two days later.

Review.Titre: Good products but PPC could up it's customer support
Review.Contenu: Ordered some lighting products and received them successfully in a safe, greatly packed shipped box in a timely manner. Had a goof-up where my credit card doubled it's transaction to PPC. Inquired twice through customer support but never heard any responses - would have been super nice to have a response of some sort confirming the decline or notice of my second accidental payment. They did although respond telling me they were short staffed so my package would be later if that was OK, but still didn't respond to my inquires???Products seem to be working fine though.
I really like performance Pc, but when it comes to calling them for customer service, they never answer the phone

Ordered an EKWB water block that I’ve had my eye on waiting for it to hit stateside in order to avoid higher shipping cost. The item arrived quickly as expected considering that PPCS is based a few hours away from me. For some reason when I checked out I was charged a shipping fee on an order that should have qualified for free shipping. I didn’t realize this until the item arrived. Not sure what happened with that. Otherwise great prices and ordering experience that I’ve always gotten with PPCS.

Review.Titre: Pump with custom sleeving had its molex…
Review.Contenu: Pump with custom sleeving had its molex wired completely wrong, i.e. 12v to ground and ground to 5v. I was able to fix it but shouldnt have to, this is just careless
Shipping rates are too high. Apparently USPS charges ppcs more to ship small priority packages than they do non business customers.

Normally very happy with my experience. Last order shipped the wrong product right before Christmas, then turns out you didn’t have the correct product in stock, so an even longer delay. Still have yet to receive the correct product.

before i ordered my tubing i had a question,called them,no answer,left a message,no callback.....so i ordred $70 worth of wrong tubing...my mistake i suppose......called back again to re-order...no answer.....again..but.........i re-ordred again....ugh..note:there shipping is fast if...u pay $20 for 2 day delivery on a 3lb pacakge...

Review.Titre: Discount codes may not lead to actual discounts
Review.Contenu: The go to site for the widest selection of custom pc watercooling parts. Frequent discount codes make parts more affordable than some other places. However, the site is really slow. Navigating around is a pain. Also, the discount code not working with free shipping makes the overall discount actually less. Very misleading.

The ordering was easy and accurate.  I chose USPS for delivery.  Big mistake.  The package was delivered late Sunday in the rain with no covering.  So, the shipping carton and invoice were soaked.  Fortunately the product came in its own plastic bubble, so no harm.  There was no notice or communication of delivery.

Review.Titre: The Website is in need of refinement
Review.Contenu: The Website is in need of refinement, especially in searches and search options. Finding smaller items like fittings can be time consuming

Everything I ordered came packed well and all the water cooling parts had zero leaks. The reason I gave 3 stars for this shipment is because there were fingerprints all over the radiators I bought and dust/debris over all the boxes. I ordered the EK quantum surface radiators in black and had all 3 of them custom painted with the powder coating service they provide. The powder coating itself is pretty good but has some flaws. It isn't as good as some local powder coating jobs I've seen. But my issue was that since they do this service themselves, it seems when they are handling the radiators they do not use gloves. Being a professional reseller I figured this would be standard. Or at least clean the radiators before you send them off because it was pretty hard to clean the fingerprints after they had all that time to really stick to the sides of the radiators. Maybe I'm just being picky but I'm someone who always handles my PC components with gloves to avoid fingerprints. Also one of the x360 radiators I got has these streaks on the side that won't come of even when I clean them. Almost like scratching. I'm not sure if this was from the EK factory or this was caused by improper handling of the radiators. It's on both sides and if the fingerprints are anything to guess from I'd say it's improper handling. Anyway once cleaned the radiators looked pretty good other than those streaks.

The menu on the left side of the page needs a lot of work. Watercooling has an option for bay size. this is the first thing and it is clutter. sneak over to Titan Rig and steel some ideas. I like the stacked menus at Mod My Mods.I would like the option to always be able to look at 96 items per page without having to reselect it with each search.Load times could be a little faster but have improved over the last year. Stock is lacking. I am sleeving power cables and had to get the parts else ware because PPCS was out of stock, or 3 times the cost on the items like connectors.All that is said as constructive criticism. I still enjoy and use this site. The notes above would just make it easier for me to recommend the site to others
I like their prices, but their shipping leaves a lot to be desired. The time frame for delivery is too high, and to choose faster is too expensive.
Great pricing and transparent stock levels (if the item supports this feature).

Review.Titre: Great Products and Prices, not so great on advertised processing and shipping
Review.Contenu: Excellent product selection and pricing. Very happy with items purchased. Unfortunately didn't have the best experience with shipping times and communication. I selected rush order and was charged for it. Over 24 hours later, I was contacted by a representative explaining that despite being list as having several in stock, that one of my items was not in stock. I was told I could have the rest of my order shipped immediately, then have the remaining item shipped within the next day or two. After asking some info, I agreed to this. However, it took the representative over another 24 hours to respond confirming this, then they did not ship anything from my order another 24 hour period, which led to a severely inconvenient delay for me. While once shipped the parts arrived fast and in great condition, it took over 72 hours for them to process and ship what was promised to be a rush order, when their normal non-rush processing period is listed as 24 hours. I understand things happen, but the fact they advertise this is a bit misleading. Also, I was not refunded my rush order charge, despite the fact that the agreement in the purchase states it will be refunded if the order is not processed within 24 hours. So this left a sour experience on what was otherwise a great website and purchasing experience. If not for this delay, I would have given 5 stars, so your experience, especially if you do not need your items immediately, will probably be great.

Review.Titre: I only just received the package
Review.Contenu: I only just received the package, asking me what I think is a bit premature.

Review.Titre: There are some problems with site…
Review.Contenu: There are some problems with site navigation.  For example, if I select 96 per page, It would show over 10 pages of items, but it would simply repeat page 1 and page 2 infinitely.  I would like a longer history for past orders.Also, the site didn't inform me there might be a problem when I made an order with a different destination  address than the billing address and I had to play email tag for a few days to resolve it. If the site warned me at check out, I would have simply used a different card.
The site just feels so 2003. It difficult to browse the site. I did find the item I was looking for, but it took some effort.

Review.Titre: You seriously need to update your…
Review.Contenu: You seriously need to update your website already. It is horrible. I love you guys because the shipping is fast and what you have in stock is nerd heaven, but my Lord, the problems with your website are unbearable sometimes. You're going to lose a lot of business, if you haven't already, because of how awful it is.

Review.Titre: How much money did you loose by…
Review.Contenu: How much money did you loose by advertising a 112% discount?I picked you because I got tired of Frozen-cpu, that means you got my money by default. At least your shipping was faster, but you guys need to fire your web designers and the people that make up your promotions. Mislabel advertisements, shotty check out process and broken clearance link looks poorly on your business. You also need to update your products list. Some of the things you don't have listed in the correct category.  The XSPC CPU water block in fact comes with the LGA 1700 hardware.

Review.Titre: Your website is kind of slow and…
Review.Contenu: Your website is kind of slow and clunky. Filtering is kind of hard and sometimes filters out items it shouldn't. There are also a lot of weird bugs in it. Other than that your selection is great and your service is top notch. You also get bonus points for offering ups because FedEx is horrible.

Review.Titre: Website needs some work, crashes a lot.
Review.Contenu: I love your store and your merchandise but the website needs some work. Lots of dead links, hard to search for items. Sometimes the website crashes during checkout. Doesn’t matter which browser I use, Edge, Chrome, Safari, Firefox. Been trying to get some tubing for my water cooled build and when I click on a link it takes me to a dead link.

Review.Titre: Good selection but had issues checking out
Review.Contenu: Good selection of water cooling parts (only place I could find with the pump I was looking for) but the site was kind of slow and I had some issues with trying to checkout with Amazon payments and it took multiple attempts over a few days before my order would go through. I also did not get a confirmation email of the order (but did get one for shipping). I'll probably come back for the selection of parts but the experience could be a bit better.

While the selection of items at your disposal is great, the shipping costs are even greater.I had to pay just as much for the shipping fee as I did for the items I purchased. And while I did want to fill up my cart with more items, I had to give up on that because of the extra shipping costs.Also, apparently, to my great regret, buying for more than 75$ doesn't get you free shipping worldwide.

First, I really love the inventory, the shipping was fast, everything about the experience was pretty standard, but literally one of the clunkiest websites I’ve ever been on. I don’t understand how that’s possible when you guys are in the computer business. It’s just really slow and glitchy. So I will continue shopping with you but I kind of dread going on the website every single time.

Review.Titre: The part is pretty good, but a few things wrong
Review.Contenu: One of the screens that holds the plastic to the other piece of plastic for the "light bar" effect was too long.  They drilled the holes for the fans, but you have no way to mount them unless you get insanely long screws and use nuts.  Should include some kind of hardware or make it so you can screw into the actual plastic.

Everything in the execution is almost excellent, prices, stock, delivery, etc.Problem is in the actual paying for an order, it is to put it mildly, miserable.Amazon Pay throws an error. Logging in says no, unconfirmed, which doesn't work. Paypal is hit and miss. It shouldn't be oh so difficult to actually consummate things, have you take my money. Very frustrating.

Review.Titre: Too soon to ask for feedback.
Review.Contenu: 1.   Asking for customer feedback before your customers receive what they've ordered is probably not the best idea to start with.2. I placed an order on Thursday, it is now Monday afternoon,  The only update I've received regarding my order is the fact that a shipping label has been printed.  I understand that you offer no refunds regarding delayed shipping, but could you box up my stuff, and drop it in the mail please?Edit: Thank you for the update. Was I supposed to receive a shipping update on Friday?

Review.Titre: I had to wait for three weeks for the…
Review.Contenu: I had to wait for three weeks for the item to ship (pre-order) but all's good. I was charged by Customs extortionately because the declared value of the product was more than $300 even if I only paid ~$208.Performance PC's won't adjust the value even for less than $10 even if that means the export would breeze through Customs and I wouldn't have to pay duty and tax. So keep that in mind.

Review.Titre: Tried for over a week to place my…
Review.Contenu: Tried for over a week to place my order. Thought there was some glitch with it not accepting my credit card this time. So tried Amazon pay with same credit card and mailing address... it went through no problem. I put up with the glitchy website to order things but the system not being able to process a simple order is not a great user experience. This is 2021 and you should have your website working more like current tech, well since you do sell tech items, heck I would be embarrassed to be advertising with this website to new clients,

Love the store, love the prices, love the support I receive from the humans that work there.  -2 stars for the website (using chrome), finding items very difficult with the existing filters/sort features.  Also sub menus from the navigation bar don’t persist (example select by type, water cooling, then get over to radiators before the screen blinks away).

Review.Titre: The service from ppcs is very good
Review.Contenu: The service from ppcs is very good, i had support on discord under half an hour, the guy(Semipermeable Potato#1980) helped me and gattered the information to awnser my question at his best. ppcs also sameday shipped my order wich is awesome since i ordered at like 14 pm. My only concern isnt from ppcs, its from the shipping compagny, my package didnt move from its locatation for 3 days and its disapointing since i paid close to 100$ CAD to get it shipped to Quebec.

The website shopping experience, at least on mobile, is subpar. The site is slow to render and is organized into overly broad categories without any hierarchy. If you don't know the product you want by name your only options are to try your luck with the search, click through the dozens of pages for the overall category, or use the gigantic, confusing list of (often contradictory) filters.That aside, the prices are reasonable and your support is good.

Review.Contenu: I haven't got my products yet.  I chose ground shipping and I'm in Washington state.  Their proximity to me and my shipping choice is dictating the 3 star rating more than anything.  If it gets here on time (Friday) this rating will go up.  Thanks.

The fans came on time. They look of goodQuality. However they were not sleeved as ordered. I thought maybe it was just a few. But, after opening all 6 none of them had any sleeving over the wires. Review.Titre: Great selection, slowest web site on planet earth.
Review.Contenu: PPC has a great selection on thesloweste-commercewebplatformever.I have a mental picture of a couple Raspberry Pi boards covered in 2" of dust in a closet somewhere. It's been an issue since, like, forever, so I doubt my review will make any difference, but seriously they ought to look into AppDynamics or Dynatrace or AppOptics or *something* to help figure out why page loads consistently take 10+ seconds.

Review.Titre: Inventory count was not what was…
Review.Contenu: Inventory count was not what was displayed on the website. That being said, I did rank 3 stars in stead of 1 because there was a shipping error and after I reported that issue they refunded my shipping.

Great way to get water cooling parts but the website interface is very hard to navigate and the search bar was also not very helpful. I had to do use EKs web site to get SKUs to find what I wanted on this website

Review.Titre: Your website is very slow to load on…
Review.Contenu: Your website is very slow to load on any browser I use and any computer.  When I try to view an order or an invoice I get the perpetual spinning loading circle, pages take too long to render.  This is 2020 not 1997.  Customer service and shipping speed on the other hand are great, but I cannot give it a 5 star review since it's so difficult to compare similar items on the site and it's so sluggish.

Review.Titre: This would be five stars if I didn't…
Review.Contenu: This would be five stars if I didn't have to spend 40 minutes cleaning up all the packing peanuts. Please don't use packing peanuts. It's an awful mess to contend with, especially in large quantities. They static cling to everything and consumed an entire garbage bag for disposal.

20% restocking fee is quite harsh on bigger items. A flat fee would be more appropriate. I prefer to order from smaller businesses but the practice of gouging on restocking fees pushes me towards different retailers. I ended up selling an item on ebay instead of returning it because of the fee. The item did not fit in my case. Fast shipping. Website was very slow at times, but overall good experience minus the restocking fee.

Review.Titre: Good prices and selection, slow website
Review.Contenu: Pretty good prices and selection. The bad side is that the website is quite slow. I have tried on multiple devices and networks, and the website was sluggish on all attempts. I continued with my purchase due to the prices and selection, but a faster interface would have helped with finding the products I was looking for.

Review.Titre: Great products and prices; site needs work
Review.Contenu: The product selection and pricing is very good!  Good enough for 5 stars.  Reason this is 3 stars is because, wow, this site is really hard to use.  It's slow, there are banners that shift things as you're viewing the page, it pretty much doesn't work on mobile at all, I attempted to check out with PayPal and Amazon pay multiple times on my phone before conceding and going on my laptop where it worked.

Review.Titre: Great people,  huge selection, poor website
Review.Contenu: PPCs' customer service is great, the selection of items available is huge, but the website is subpar. If you know exactly the item you wish, you can find it well enough, but the search function is dismal returning a long list of items with little relevance. And the site is also extremely slow.

Shipping time is outrageous. I bought parts from Newegg, modmymods,EVGA,and Outlet PC at the same time or later and received everything a week before performance PCs order. I still don’t have this order placed on 11/26 today is 12/4. In a day and age you can get anything from around the country in 4 days max performance PCs finds a way to ship something taking 2 weeks(estimated arrival of order). It’s like it’s 1998 again.

Website loads very slow and the layout is pretty confusing. Wasted so much time navigating through the website and it doesn’t help at all when it takes 15+ seconds for pages load. Not to mention the uber slow free shipping option they have. Spent 300+ USD and the fastest they could get my items to me was ONE WEEK. Other distributors use much faster shipping options for their ‘free shipping’. On a good note though, their prices are very good and they ship items out quick.

They ship on time.  Products arrive in good condition. On to the negative.Performance PC's website is horrible even after changing to the new site. 3 out of 5 of my last water cooling orders have gone through Amazon and Newegg since Performance PC's site stops loading or is so slow it would take hours to complete an order. How does a company not understand their main point of contact with the customer has to be reliable?

Out of every business I order my pc parts from performance PC's is definitely the slowest. High shipping prices but still takes a full week to get to Texas. I can order from 4 separate places and end up having to wait for my performance pc orders. That being said I love the huge selection of parts.

This is not a bad site. They have lots of cool stuff.  However, they do NOT have an updated inventory information on the website. More than once, I would be contacted and informed AFTER I ordered and paid, that such and such item is NOT in stock; which is very upsetting. Especially, when you have a certain plan and need specific parts to finish your gaming build.  So far, I have not been very impressed.  Have not seen super sales or discounts either.

The reason I would rate it at 3 instead of 5 is due to the website needing to be upgraded, It's slow and even causes the store issues when people call support and orders need to be changed.Once that is handled it'll be a full 5 stars.

I found the selection of available products to be excellent and expansive. The website was laid out in a way that was intuitive and easy to navigate. The only issue that I had was the websites overall sluggish responsiveness to my inputs, and how long it took to fetch thumbnails or product information

Company has decent prices and a wide option of parts. Would have gave 5 stars, but got an email saying they miscounted the number of supplies they had for one of my items. Didn't not get the help I expected to fix it, basically they made it my problem.Edit:  Removed a comment as I expect this isn't the norm based on all the other reviews.  However, still getting 3 stars based on my experience.  Also, the Amazon logon thing was awful, gave up after 10 mins of trying to getting it to work.

Review.Titre: Item arrived a bit late but great service…
Review.Contenu: Item arrived a bit late but not their fault blame FedEx. My entire order was well package they go above and beyond to make sure your order is well secured, and they're fast at answering your questions. The biggest issue is their website is so slow and unresponsive is like they took a step back into 1999 and based their entire site on a late 90's feel. Overall great customer service, fast delivery, best site for water cooling parts. If they can just fix their website they have a winner.

They had some server problems that made for a very frustrating experience, but the company contacted me afterwards, and its hard to blame a seller for shipping quickly. Also, I've had good experiences with them in the past, so I've upped my rating a bit. I will still buy from them in the future.

Review.Titre: the website is a bit confusing
Review.Contenu: the website is a bit confusing, plus over a year ago, i ordered some products that came dead on arrival, i contacted you to see if i could get them returned so you could send me new ones, all i was told is that you guys would contact the manufacturers to see if they would take those defective products back, i have done all i can to be a loyal customer, I've spent over 5.000 dollars worth of products from you guys but now, i might have to rely on other sources to get what i want.sincerely Cristian Mattus.

Review.Titre: Good selection of parts, but slow website
Review.Contenu: Good selection of PC enthusiasts components on website, easy to navigate and search for the items you want. Unfortunately my shopping experience was hampered by the slow internet connection to the web server hosting the website. (Done the necessary TRACERT, packets were dropped near destination).

The website crashes all the time and little to 0 stock on every item. But they do have small discounts codes and sales frequently. Never had to contact support which is a good thing. Just wish they restocked. Modmymods restocks every few months and titan rig is more expensive but frequently restocks.

Review.Titre: Been 10 days and still cant see…
Review.Contenu: Been 10 days and still cant see tracking spent almost 300$ to be left in the dark. smhUpdate: it seems the tracking had ended up in the spam folder after all.Prices seem good but free shipping is really slow, would have expected faster than week 8 day shipping on decent sized orders.

The website is ridiculously slow. What are you running it on? Is every single call synchronous? Get a decent developer to optimize.After getting reply from PPCS I raised the score a bit, but I think this new website has been around for 2 years now, and it is still slow.I've used them for a long time, and their older website was much quicker to use despite its simpler design. There are definitely trustworthy, have biggest selection for the US, and always delivered once you go through the pain of using their website.

Review.Titre: I paid for 2 day shipping and I'm…
Review.Contenu: I paid for 2 day shipping and I'm getting 6 day shipping.. I'm not happy with that.I did choose FedEx home delivery, because it said 2 days next to it.. If it said 6 day, I would have chosen something different. Thank you for crediting that cost, I do appreciate that.

Review.Titre: The products purchased are top quality
Review.Contenu: The products purchased are top quality, and shipping was fast and on time. However, your website needs to be completely redone. It is slow, and clunky. Almost impossible to navigate with the current layout.

Review.Titre: I was sent an email asking to review my…
Review.Contenu: I was sent an email asking to review my experience with performance pc's. Bought an item and it took 5 days before the tracking showed it was dropped off to usps. it still has yet to arrive 7 days later so there isn't much for me to review. Hurray for slow companies.

Review.Titre: If not for the fact that the delivery…
Review.Contenu: If not for the fact that the delivery service provider didn't even make an attempt to deliver the package as scheduled for the 2 day delivery I paid for I would give 5 stars, as this rebuild is now going to be behind schedule, well...Very unhappy customer

Review.Titre: Good selection of products, clunky product pages
Review.Contenu: Good selection of products. Browsing and search were reasonably easy to navigate to find what I wanted. Loved that I could use amazon checkout. I did not like how slow and clunky the product pages were. Elements were often slow to load and respond and the layout was inconsistent.

Review.Titre: Never received order nor follow up…
Review.Contenu: Never received order nor follow up contact... NOTE: Within a few minutes of placing the order I sent (replied) email confirming order and addresses - After completing this review my order was shipped and reply posted by Performance PCs. Being former Chief of online (wholesale) tech distribution company myself, I realize bad reviews can suck and why providing details - Since got the order (overnight shipping nearly 10 days later) I’m the end, and PPCS replied I’ve changed review from 1 start to 3 - Maybe give them another try and see how things go from here.

I've ordered about 6 times from Performance PCS. Customer service is good and they have a good selection of products. Unfortunately, trying to find something on their website is next to impossible unless you know exactly what you want. Also - their descriptions are often incorrect and it's important to always check the specs with the manufacturer before ordering. I would give them 5 stars if they would make online ordering simpler and more accurate. I do plan to order from them regularly but only if I can't find what I need from other retailers.

Review.Titre: Great customer service, products & pricing, but website is the worst!!
Review.Contenu: You have great products at some of the best pricing around but your website is so intolerable. It freezes up ever five seconds, it takes for ever to load anything, i have to use google chrome "Inspect" feature to access my purchase items to see if they got shipped and where they are at.  It's really bad.  Customer service was very good though.  they new and under stood that the website was really buggy and got my order going within minutes.  those guys are great.  And you have some of the Rarest items that I can't find anywhere else.

Review.Titre: Most of the time everything goes good…
Review.Contenu: Most of the time everything goes good when I order. There was a small issue which was no problem. They were out of stock of an item and said they could swap. Cool, phone call over problem solved. However, I noticed there was no update to the support ticket or tracking, after I tried to rush the order with the option, meaning this did not get resolved even though I spoke with someone. I messaged again on Saturday and I got a response Monday(today). They have resolved it today, but having to contact them about everything after already resolving the issue has left a bad taste.

Performance-PCs is a fantastic company with good prices, prompt shipping and stellar customer service.Unfortunately, their website is excruciating to use, to the point that I will avoid purchasing from them if I know I can find a given item elsewhere.

Review.Titre: Website is still slow and freezes after…
Review.Contenu: Website is still slow and freezes after many years. Trying to simply go back to where you were viewing products takes you to the top of the page. The store itself carries a lot of specialty products that are hard to find even though you often get hit with out of stock.

Review.Titre: Got the part I ordered not the shipping I picked.
Review.Contenu: Got the part I ordered, but at double the shipping rate I chose.   I specifically chose the lowest rate through the USPS, but somehow I was charged the higher FedEx rate after the PayPal invoice came through.  It's annoying to pay $13 shipping on a $12 part.

Web site is very slow, I'm using Firefox, Edge and Safari. Pagination does not work well.Shipping is very expensive, $15 for $40 worth of goods. Have to pile up items to make $150 and get free shipping. Can't buy few small items, they will be golden.

This time around, as usual the products were shipped right away and arrived when I needed them. Ive put through a lot of orders at PPCS and over that time I think I had a problem with one order but was minor and their customer service is generally great and have always helped. On my latest order though, I would have scored at least one star higher but I ordered a few short lengths of sleeving I needed for a specific build and for what ever reason they arrived tied in tight knots which put permanent kinks in the sleeving and I could not use them at all which was disappointing and frustrating.

Ok experience only.Website was somewhat slow.  I had to come directly to this site to purchase something that's not on your Amazon Webstore.  And, some items on the Amazon Webstore are not on your site.  Makes it's a cumbersome shopping experience.

Review.Titre: Great place to get custom PC parts, but..
Review.Contenu: Great place to get custom PC parts. Service and shipping is great. The one thing that really needs work is the website. Both desktop and mobile sites are EXTREMELY slow when searching for products and loading pages (believe me, it's not my internet speed). It takes a lot longer for me to find the parts I need because of page load and search times alone. It feels like whoever is hosting the site is overloaded and the site doesn't have the resources it needs to actively pull from it's huge catalog of products. In order to make the customer experience 10/10, the site needs to be reworked! Thank you guys and keep up the good work.

Review.Titre: Good prices and selection but the site is SLOW as molasses.
Review.Contenu: Good prices and selection but the site is SLOW, and the formatting is really outdated, the website needs an overhaul. It really hasn't improved or evolved it all in the past 10 years, maybe a bit faster than it was but not by much.

Review.Titre: There is a good selection and decent…
Review.Contenu: There is a good selection and decent prices. The issue I have is that with every search I have to switch the number or items shown per page from 12 to 96. Loading a new page wouldn't be so bad if the pages didn't take exponential longer than other sites to load. The search items need help.In all, the interface needs help. Look at the date on this review and hopefully my concerns are resolved in the future. The site has great selection. The free shipping was fairly quick, 4 days I think. I returned one part of my order because I changed other parts of my system and there was no hassle. Customer service was great.

Review.Titre: Good place to shop, site needs optimization.
Review.Contenu: The selection of products is quite excellent and the prices are competitive with other us/EU retailers. However, the website itself often runs extremely poorly, with search result pages and even product pages taking several seconds to fully load.

Their website is frankly awful: slow, buggy, incomplete item descriptions, jpeg artifacts everywhere; but their selection is great, prices are good, and customer service is good, so I'll continue shopping with them.

Review.Titre: They offer free shipping on orders over…
Review.Contenu: They offer free shipping on orders over $100.  But if you want faster delivery you have to pay full price for that shipping.  At the least they should discount the value of the 'free shipping' to the other shipping options.
PPCS  need to check parts, I understand they cant open manufacturer packaging but my recent purchase from them had a screw and 2 washers missing.

Not a big fan of the new website design although it does operate better than the previous. Would not allow me to search by brands had to get creative in order to navigate my way to a particular brand and then was able to find the components.

Review.Titre: Between the ads everywhere and the…
Review.Contenu: Between the ads everywhere and the websites slow loading time on all pages  , the website is very frustrating and unintuitive to navigate.  Also shipping is pretty expensive compared to other places.  Too bad frozencpu went down the drain.

I really enjoy this website's competitive pricing!However, I had trouble finding certain products. In addition navigating through the website was quite laggy and slow(loading pages). I wish my shopping experience was more fluid!

Review.Titre: The site functions like it should, but still slow
Review.Contenu: A lot of improvements were made to the site since my last purchase. It's still very slow and I'll see the occasional, unexplained glitch. However, things functioned as they should and I was able to place an order without issues.

The catalog and service are great, but damn the website is badly coded. It is slow, buggy, and often gets stuck, rendering the entire page unclickable (none of the links can be clicked, the rotating loading symbol never goes away, and a reload is needed). Page loading times are horrendous; it feels like i am trying to access a website on the other side of the world when in fact I am in the same country. This is not a one time thing. It's chronic, and has been like this for years. There are numerous complaints on this very issue that are not difficult to find with a quick google. Get the website fixed! It's ruining the shopping experience and costing you dollars.Edit: Typos

While the ordering process and delivery were as good as can be expected, it would have been nice to know exactly what I was ordering. No where on the product page did it say that the snap-caps were plastic.

Your selection is excellent as a whole.  However your webpage required me to call you multiple times to make corrections so I could actually purchase things.  Further you had items listed above the retail value.

Gotta be honest here...the part selection is great.  The customer service is great as well.  But the website is just ass slow.  Also, last purchase I was double charged.Hard to give 5 stars, even though I want too.

The site was very slow and rather difficult to use. I would have made my order a couple weeks ago if the site could move a little bit quicker. Also, I had problems setting my address and using the Amazon payment system.

Review.Titre: Shipping box was damaged but products ok
Review.Contenu: Shipping box was damaged but products okIt was due to the rain I assume the cardboard box had a giant hole and all the packing was coming out. Luckily no fittings were missing but could have easily fallen out.

Performance PCs is one of the slower sites I've used when looking online for PC parts, but they've got a wide selection, often run promotions and ship quickly. I also like the "most popular in this category" feature as it helps me find items that other buyers are going with faster. I will continue to use PPCS in the future, but they definitely need to update the site. A mobile friendly site or app would help too.EDIT: Good to hear the issues are being worked out. I will update my review next time if I am no longer having issues.One other quality of life improvement, please make it so we are not prompted for email address to look up shipment tracking after logging in. It should just be available.
Website navigation is terrible. Everything is slow. The website now is worse than i remember using it 9 years ago. Aside from the website from the 90’s, product selection and pricing is fair.
Easy to shop, shipped quick. My only aggravation was how slow your web pages loaded! I reverted to searching for a part number on another site to plug it directly in to cut out the wait time.
Product came beat up, price and shipping was good but I'm looking for other vendors who can treat expensive fittings right
Cables are nice quality and I like being able to choose the different sizes. Sadly I ordered round cables and received flat ones (like all the other ones that I have).

Review.Titre: PPCs is not the PPCs of yesteryear.
Review.Contenu: PPCs is not the PPCs of yesteryear.They used to be simple and straight forward with excellent support.For this transaction I sent 2 queries to sales, neither was answered. Also PPCs now has 'rewards' and other gimmicks that do not work... they need to get back to basics.Lastly, the website is horrible... slow, over populated, difficult to navigate, searches yield result not related to the search.On the plus side, PPCs has the largest selection of product from any computer store... but be ready to put in the work to find it.
My initial order although payment was received , however was never shipped due to some type of computer error. Although once notified performance PCs were very helpful and overnighted my package.

Customer service was great. Website was accurate, and the shipping was quick.Only gripe I have would be they should have put the part in a bigger box. It wasn't well protected and had some corners smashed.Product was fine because of its own packaging. The distroplate is definitely more on the basic side, but hey thr pirce was awesome.I should be filling the distroplate this week and will update as needed.

Review.Titre: Good prices, good shipping, will do business again.
Review.Contenu: Pretty good selection of pc watercooling parts, shipping was within time frame, everything was well packed, and prices were very reasonable too. If the selection were just a smidge better I would give five stars, but for some parts I had to go to other sellers even though I would have preferred a one stop shop.  If I could give a 4.5 I would.

Recently I purchased a Watercool MO-RA3 360 PRO - Stainless Steel from Performance PC's, Inc. - and in the pull down menu I selected the Bitspower Fitting(s) that I wanted included with my purchace and I only received one fitting in the shipment , so I only give 4 stars ... other then that issue I like the quality of what I received.

They fixed the problem. I ordered water-cooling tubing, but one-size-too-large was delivered. This could have been disastrous had it been used in my computer. Fortunately, I detected the issue, and they immediately sent the correct size tubing, at no further cost. So, this is a mixed review, in this instance. But I believe this type of problem is easy in a warehouse, where this tubing is snipped from various large rolls -- easy to misplace or mistake -- rather than individually labeled packages. So, my review is somewhere between one-star and five-stars. (!) I figure they'll now instruct their warehouse employees. Everything else about the order was great.

Review.Titre: sales is great, but everybody else?
Review.Contenu: when I spoke with the member of sales I got plenty of information with quickly responded emails. when it comes to their customer service team it seems not existent. when it comes to the RMA team, they'll send something but they won't send you any messages. I've had an issue with an item that I purchased that has killed multiple inverters and I cannot get any of the customer service people to reach out despite sending multiple messages.

Got everything that I ordered, and it shipped promptly. Ordering was a little wonky with options for PayPal, which I tried first before resorting to using my credit card.  Only four stars because of the ordering wonkiness, which is perhaps extreme, but I don't think my failed attempt at using PayPal was operator error.  I could be wrong.

Review.Titre: Great experience and fast shipment after confirmation
Review.Contenu: As a new customer who is also new to watercooling they provided me with good service and immediately let me know that a part I had ordered was no longer in stock and recommended a replacement part. Also being in South Africa, I was extremly surprised at how quickly I received my order.I would rate 5 stars if the customer service employee, instead of sending only a part number, also sent either a link to the exact part or provided a description of the replacement after I queried what the replacement looks like due to the part number not being present on the website.

Overall it was a great experience. Very helpful especially since it's down the street from me. My only gripe I suppose is the website. Seemed a little clunky and checkout was a little wonky. Had to refresh a couple of times to get my order to register.  But all and all very happy.

As it turns out I was overcharged a little on shipping and PPCS refunded the difference. They sent me an email and followed up with me. I appreciate that. The one thing I did have a tiny gripe about was being shipped the wrong color 480mm EK radiator. I ordered two black radiators and got one white and one black. I'm not going to return it because I can hide the white radiator down below the PSU shield. Overall I had a great experience, my order arrived when they said it would and everything works great. I plan on making another purchase as soon as they get the two Pump/Res combos I need to finish my Lian Li V3000 Plus dual loop build. I like dealing with PPCS, I like that they are in the USA, and I really like they charge the same prices as the manufacturers websites.

Review.Titre: PPCS - best place for water cooling…
Review.Contenu: PPCS is by far the best place for water cooling enthusiast.  I love the selection, the fast fulfillment and the reasonable shipping policies.  My only complaint is the performance of their website - the functionality is great but it always feels slow, like it is overloaded, but it's definitely better than what is was in the past and certainly not worth going to some other site.

Review.Titre: I try to go to you guys first for any…
Review.Contenu: I try to go to you guys first for any water cooling needs.
Ships fast, usually have what I need for my builds in-stock. Customer service works with me on items that aren’t in stock due to miscounts/errors or are delayed.

Great service and fast shipping. The international shipping (from the US to Canada) was a bit expensive.If not for that I would give 5 stars. I understand it's not entirely the fault of Performance PC.Also, they have a great choice of parts.

Review.Titre: Parts was packed well and shipped in…
Review.Contenu: Parts was packed well and shipped in time.Only issue is the shipping price. I used the USPS priority shipping option which cost $15.Having shipping many items myself, USPS offers flat rate shipping that costs far less.I was in a bind and this store was the only one I could find with the item I needed.The exorbitant shipping cost would have turned me away normally.

Review.Titre: I'm local but could not pick my items…
Review.Contenu: I'm local but could not pick my items at the store (no store front) and I had to wait until the mail delivered the package.Big selection and knowing if the item is in stock, or not, is a big plus.

Review.Titre: Website's a bit old fashioned but everything else is great
Review.Contenu: Website could be a bit more user friendly, but selection is great, prices are good, and support is very responsive.

Great communication, ordered a custom made part and the only thing I would have liked to have seen that was missing is a suggested placement for accessories included. Fantastic build quality will definitely buy from again.
Amazing service and locally located. Love the company but the website is sooo slow and anemic. One star off for website. Everything else is amazing.

Review.Titre: One of the best places to get pc watercooling gear.
Review.Contenu: Their prices are better than most. Shipping costs could be better if not hitting the free shipping mark. Limited stock or no stock on a lot of items I need.
Great and fast shipping, but the package was not delivered to my house,  I had to go pick it up from UPS center. Other than that it was great quick and and the package was secure
Selection of parts is awesome. My only complaint, which isn't a big one, is that I wish shipping was a little faster.

I ordered some of these Belkin Conserve Switches power bars as I have 2 of them already and they are so great for saving money on power bills for phantom power! All arrived very well wrapped. I got unlucky and had one that the remote didn't work, or the conserve switch itself on the unit. So I was unable to use the conserve function which is the reason I buy these. I know exactly how to set these up and use them as I already had 2 of them. So this one was malfunctioning, which is no fault of the seller. All the units I bought here had slightly leaking batteries though, which is odd that all of them would. But, I simply put fresh batteries in them-not a huge deal. I live in Canada so it would have been such a bother to return the one that wasn't working. Other than that, this company sent me what I ordered and I thought the price was fair, despite getting dinged with duty taxes! That is always a chance we take though when ordering out of country.

Review.Titre: Fast shipping, no damage, only issue on checkout
Review.Contenu: I haven't opened the item as I'm gathering the rest of the parts for my new computer build, but there were no damages, and was sealed correctly, it came well packaged and no signs  that the item was opened or anything, plus the model and everything shows to be the correct item and not a wrong item.Also, it was fast shipping so I highly recommend them, the only con would be  during checkout I had to purchase it through PayPal since the page kept loading and didn't do anything only by doing it through paypal I was able to submit my order

Review.Titre: Not the best prices but some items…
Review.Contenu: Not the best prices but some items worth ordering.As for the delivery, sound and safe plus neat packing.
Quick shipping, good price. Large number of water cooling Items from quality manufacturers in stock
Although the website looks a bit archaic, and product write-ups could be more exhaustive, selection is excellent, and shipping is very quick.
Fast shipping and good inventory.  I just wish the website wasn't so slow.

Review.Titre: Payed for new but received open box
Review.Contenu: Payed for new but received open boxI’ve updated this review to reflect the very professional way Lucas from Performance PC’s handled my concern. His prompt response and effort to restore my trust and happiness with my purchase is second to none. Clearly a team that understands enthusiasts. I will definitely buy from them again.

Review.Titre: Great variety of products but the site…
Review.Contenu: Great variety of products but the site on mobile is terrible

Review.Titre: Really lack quality on this specific…
Review.Contenu: Really lack quality on this specific product
They're good. Shipping costs a bit much but overall, it's good.

Review.Titre: Had part of what I was looking for and…
Review.Contenu: Had part of what I was looking for and shipped it promptly - that’s as good as it gets!

Review.Titre: I rated 4 stars out of 5 because of slow response to emailso
Review.Contenu: I received my order undamaged due to items packed really good!! Thank you!! However, when I was ordering items correspondance was not answered for several days. (24/7), I hope that this is not a regular occurrence. I will from order from PPCS in the future due to the good packing,finally reaching out to emails,free shipping,and asking me to rate my experience with PPCS.

Review.Titre: The manuals are a little confusing
Review.Contenu: The manuals are a little confusing, especially with the mesh filter part. I couldn’t figure how to install that for the longest time and wasted the magnets tape for no reason. Also the panel fan support is really thick and my Lian li SL120 fans screw wasn’t long enough to hold the fan in place. Overall still a pretty cool design and materials are solid. Once figured out the problems it will work as intended.

Everything was received, fast.  Thank you.One complaint for -1 star...The cable combs that I bought are junk.  They broke immediately.  I recommend that you remove them from your website.  At $2.90 a piece, it's not a big deal but also doesn't make me happy.
Overall smooth & hassle free purchase
Great selection of parts, and great customer service;. the shipping costs are a little high, but overall it is a decent experience. i have spent 1000s and 1000s on this site.
Good selection and pricing. But website loads super slow and changing search pages doesnt work, esp using back button on browser, screen gets stuck on loading most of the time

Review.Titre: Happy with the panel but just had a few notes/minor issues
Review.Contenu: I am happy with the 011 Front Panel OEM with fan mounting points in black that I ordered. I WILL say that I had to pull one of the "hook" screws at the top and tap down the locking washer into the panel and reinsert the screw to get it to attach so the top was flush so I can secure my top panel over it. Also, the front panel is roughly 1mm too thick and sticks out from the front of the case where my front buttons/ports are. I imagine I misread the description, I thought I would have brackets to attach fans and not just holes drilled in the front panel. I was a bit disappointed there. Still happy with the panel! It's better than having solid glass on the front.

Fast service as always, Shipping is still costly for Canadian customers. Lots of items in stock.  Check out using a credit card continues to be a pain, but Paypal is an alternative.   A really nice thing is they pack the items well, as always the big shippers knock the parcel around but with their packing there is a buffer so usually no damage to the parts.

Enjoyed ordering parts from Performance PCs.  I've placed two orders with them now.  They have a wide selection, communicated well, and did not take long to ship the parts.  I received tracking numbers promptly after each of my orders shipped.The only complaint I have about them is that the website is very slow.  It's a real problem that needs to be addressed.

Mosaic with fan holesThe panel is well made and looks nice, just requires custom screws or rubber fan mounts that weren't included to mount fans/ rads, due to the thickness. Went with rubber fan mounts because it looks cleaner and I'm not mounting a rad to it.

Review.Titre: Just wish there was more communication…
Review.Contenu: Just wish there was more communication on time frames of made to order items. The lead time was normal but had to contact them about 4 or 5 days after order just to touch base on if there was any problemsat all. Other than that everything is good, received everything that i ordered and nothing was damaged!! Would definitely order through them again.

Review.Titre: Good shopping experience. Little on the expensive side.
Review.Contenu: Shipping was fast, order was accurate, and in good condition. Four stars because I called there staff and asked if they could reduce the price on an item listed for a ten year old MB with no success. No real fault on their part but would have made me much happier and probably would have spent more.

Review.Titre: at first I requested a price compare…
Review.Contenu: at first I requested a price compare from another store, they allowed it only for one item.  then after awhile they set the price the same.  I paid with BTC. There were some complicationsI paid but cancelled the order but still sent the btc and made a new paid order, so after some time it took to find the btc I sent the store got it back.  I wish they were a bit cheaper on delivery and the items. overall it's a good store, good prices.

Review.Titre: Everything is great, but the website could be better
Review.Contenu: Great selection, great customer service, fast shipping. The website design is fine, but its slow. Selecting things, or using filter to refine search results are slower than they should be. I hope they can make the website a bit zippier in the future. But other than that, love shopping with Performance PC's. Highly recommended.

PPCS is great. I just wish they wouldn’t let you choose 2 day shipping if they know UPS is having issues. Didn’t see the disclaimer until after I placed order (my fault). And I bought Wednesday, paid for 2 day, received Monday. Other than that frustration all products were as described and in good condition. Processing was quick.

Review.Titre: Great site with tons of unique parts!
Review.Contenu: Have not received my item, but the site has a plethora of incredible parts for customizing your PC.  The website is awful to navigate which notates my 4 star review.

I was impressed by the selection of custom loop items Performance PC's had in stock and their prices were definitely lower than the competition.  The only frustrating part was their website -- sometimes it was hard to get it to refresh, or to modify an item while I had a lot of stuff in my cart.

Amazing selection of products, and very good prices with a generous amounts of deals for savings on big orders. My only complaint is the website needs to be optimized to load a little faster.I am a returning customer and I recommend this website to anyone looking to build a custom liquid cooled computer and any DIYer.

Review.Titre: I ordered some prongs only and it cam…
Review.Contenu: I ordered some o-rings only and it cam in a large envelope full of popcorn.  I feel you guys could have just put in a small envelope (normal mailing envelope) and regular mail.  But other than that great service.  I would recommend them

Great store. Huge inventory and I like the usual discounts they offer. The only thing I don't like is the international shipping service. In the end, I had to pay an extra fee not considered when they shipped to Colombia. Going forward I will ship only to Miami and use a courier.

Order came quickly, but I would have liked an email order confirmation, which I did not get. I only got an email stating I ordered something, but it did not show order details. I also would like a packing slip which I did not get either.Other than that, the order came fast.

One of the best Customer Services for online retail, PPCs.com provided courtesy updates to carrier related issues. However, the carrier failed to post tracking updates which effects the shipper. I don't believe the carrier will ever change, they remain the same in delivery time as back in the olden days when people mail ordered items using a catalog.

Review.Titre: Not yet through with the delivery
Review.Contenu: Not yet through with the delivery, but they had a specific rare part in stock, which is a good start, and I found that the website and ordering systems worked well. Communication was abundant about my order. I was a bit bothered by the fact that sign-on-delivery and other very important features are offered as extras, and their cost is not included in the default delivery.All-in-all, though, a great experience up to this point.

Great inventory!  Shipping is reasonably fast.  My only real complaint is that the website is slow and navigating through it could be better.  The filters aren't saved when you go back which can make for a somewhat annoying shopping experience.

Review.Titre: Orded a part but found a better deal
Review.Contenu: Orded a part but found a better deal. Would have been nice for them to help with the return better. Since I will be dropping a lot of money in the near future for other parts but they are having me haft to cover the return shipping. Not a big fan of that. But the phone support was helpful and very polite. I won't be buying too many parts from them becuse eof this return issue. Besides the credit I was given for my return.

Review.Titre: The best site for buying watercooling… But,
Review.Contenu: The best site for buying watercooling equipment. All the parts you want packaged very well so it gets to you in great time.Whats a little scummy is that you'll get a 10% off coupon upon first purchase. Using this coupon voids free shipping for whatever reason. So more than likely unless you're making a huge purchase it doesn't matter. Just kinda weird.

Great customer service and prompt shipping. I needed to cancel an order and add more to the shipment, sales teams were prompt and helpful in the cancellation. Deducted one star due to their website being slow and clunky for this day and age. Not to mention that they are a PC hobbyist's dream store, it's kind of ironic.

Review.Titre: 1 Star for a still slow and frustrating…
Review.Contenu: 1 Star for a still slow and frustrating website. 4 years and a few updates and it is still slow. It takes me about an hour to fill a cart for a full loop. WHY? With that said, my order arrived fast and exact. I even got a free pen. Please either fix the website or find a way to provide more bandwidth. I am not sure what causes the slowness but I dread shopping for a new loop.

Overall company is good, product selection is good but website needs a major overhaul.Extremely difficult to search for things as the filter for categories sometimes don't have what you need. Website also loads very slow.If the website is overhauled with better categories, search functionality, and performance review would easily be 5 stars because of the service/selection.

Review.Titre: Online purchase went smooth and easy
Review.Contenu: Online purchase went smooth and easy. Quick and responsive sales team. Why 4 star, Iwish there's a way to put 4.5, is for the "okayish" delivery time compared to stablish ed online retailers. The product came as describe but have not opened or tested yet. I'll buy again, it depends on the availability of their offerings.

Good available products. However, I did not like the shipping speed. I ordered an item on Wednesday and paid for 2-day. They waiting till Friday to send it out and because 2-day does not include weekends I had to wait to get it on Tuesday.

Review.Titre: It’s almost 2 weeks and I still don’t…
Review.Contenu: It’s almost 2 weeks and I still don’t have my order. Along with the USPS problem. I know COVID can cause delays but 2 weeks from Florida! I had the wrong cable sent. I contacted customer service and they apologized and sent me a replacement 2nd day air. Now that is good customer service. Thank you PPCS!

Pretty good customer service. Was fast and nice though I feel like in my case where the item I ordered had no more stock, instead of the guy using the name of the product on the website he used its data tag thing which made it a little difficult trying to find something similar which leads me to say if they gave similar item recommendations I’d give 5 stars.

Review.Titre: Quick to Ship, but communication could use some improvement
Review.Contenu: Performance PC's was decent at communicating with me that my shipment of 1 x 3 White Lian Li Uni Fan SL120 pack may be delayed and provided tracking for it. However, I never got an e-mail with the official invoice / receipt with the total cost of my order.Other than that, their communication is okay and they were relatively quick to ship it to me.

Great site with lots of variety. Product shipped to me in a timely manner we’ll packaged. As an international buyer from outside the US using the PPC site, I find it buggy and slow with lots of animations loading here and there. Paying was not easy, as there would be a constant reload and I would lose confirmation. SCARY! But after many attempts, it did work. To buggy.

Review.Titre: Great Website for Water Cooling Parts - But Needs Fine Tuning
Review.Contenu: I like the selection of parts, however the website doesn't seem to work very smoothly. I seem to have issues whether I'm on mobile or my PC. The website seems very slow and some sections don't seem to load correctly. I think from a customer experience point of view, if this gets fixed, I would definitely rate the Performance PC's 5 stars.

Review.Titre: Great but a few down sides.
Review.Contenu: I had a overall good shopping experience, there were a few things you were out of stock on so I purchased them elsewhere.
