The only thing I did not like was when filtering something by brand, I would rather have it just say the brand in text then a low pixeled image of their logo; it was hard to see on a monitor and worse on my phone. Also would of like to have the ability to filter multiple selections.

Review.Titre: They have a great variety of…
Review.Contenu: They have a great variety of merchandise. I've made quite a few orders. All have been what I expected, packed securely and shipped quickly. I have reached out to customer support; they were friendly and answered my questions. Both via email and phone. The website is frustratingly sluggish and could also use some polish on the interface. For that I removed 1 star.

I think i was a bit surprised by the insurance charges that were levied upon delivery of the package. I had expected those prices to be included in the original bill. Maybe include a larger notification that the insurance charges are mandatory, but  will only be payable at time of delivery?

Review.Titre: They made an error, then they made it right.
Review.Contenu: They made an error in the inventory count, and what I had intended to buy was actually out of stock. Thankfully, they rectified this as best they could, allowing me to replace the part I intended to buy with an equivalent part that simply had a different finish at no cost. The website needs some work, but for their amazing customer service and a wide selection of parts, I can't help but love these guys.

Great product offering and delivery!Your site is painfully slow though and the cart disappears in what seems like a random fashion. I kept having to re-add stuff which ultimately/accidentally ended up with me ordering 2 of the same thing when I only needed one. Fortunately, it was like a $5 part so I'm not even worried but just wanted to let you know.

Performance PCs is great. huge stock of EKWB so I don't have to order overseas. Definitely my go-to watercooling store. However, I'm not a fan of the check out. Seems like the check out is laggy, I input my information and I either get a loading screen that does nothing, I get the error "payment method is not available", or nothing happens at all. For me, this isn't a "try again and it works" thing. My last order I felt lucky having it go through. For bigger orders, I'll try to make it work, if I just need a single item, I go elsewhere. I hope they can improve it!

I've used PerformancePCs for quite a few years and their stock is the best I've found in the United States. They are quick to ship your orders and their customer service has been good when used.The only negative is their website is utterly slow. I know they recently (6ish months ago?) but it is still clunky. I know they are pulling in a lot of layers on their web page but they need to balance this with performance. A literal 10+ second load time is too long for an item to load.

Review.Titre: Honest and Constructive; Website needs work
Review.Contenu: As these review asks, honest and constructive.I appreciate the sales and the discount codes from time to time.Its also always good to see employees from PPC participating in Facebook group discussions and conversations.The -1 Star is specifically for the never ending issues with the slow website.Its been like this for quite some time now.

Review.Titre: Straight forward ordering experience with no problems
Review.Contenu: Pretty simple. Found the product I wanted, ordered it, waited, picked it up, opened it, no damage, product works perfectly. Only thing keeping it from 5 stars is I didn’t get a tracking number or any way to look up a receipt for my order (but that totally could have been my fault for checking out as a guest). Would recommend!

The product itself is very nice. It is difficult to find 30W/channel controller. Fan control is stable, and components of the controller do not generate so much heat. Very satisfied.I am very satisfied with very quick shipment as well.I selected FedEx and imported to Malaysia. FedEx's freight for import declaration is 5 times higher than I actually paid to the shop, so that import duty (against CIF value) is charged more than product price. Very surprised. Maybe I will not choose FedEx in my next order.

They ended up double charging me and I noticed on a Friday. Support reached out on Monday and it’s getting resolved. They shipped the part i needed very quickly and i received it on the weekend (2 days after order was placed) so i could build my PC.I am very happy with how quick I got my part. I’d buy from them again.

Review.Titre: PPCS is a vital shop in the USA!
Review.Contenu: PPCS is a vital shop in the USA for water cooling enthusiasts, and nobody has the breadth of product selection under one roof that they do. I believe that there pricing is very good for water cooling products. Customer care seems excellent. My only nit pick is there website performance on Android is painfully slow, but on pc it is fine. My grudge is obviously personal, as I like to relax and shop on my tablet at home. Otherwise, you would get 5 + stars from me, and I am grateful they are around. dj

Always quick service and shipping. My only concern is twice I have had a email notification for back in stock alerts, did not get any notification. Just happened to check and noticed it was back in stock so ordered it. Might need some attention to the parameters co trolling the notifications.

Review.Titre: Solid place to order your watercooling gear.
Review.Contenu: Always a good place to purchase water cooling gear with plenty of checkout options including amazon pay and bitcoin which is great!Only thing I didn't like is they require a signature for orders over $500, you should be able to override this requirement. So 4/5 stars for this.

Review.Titre: Same day service and pickup, great experience
Review.Contenu: I needed a 280mm radiator for a build I was working on, ordered it around noon and they got back to me about picking it up(I did store pickup and paid $3 for same day processing) within an hour or two. Everything I could have wanted, I'm only giving them 4 stars instead of 5 because I haven't interacted with them enough to know if I just got lucky once or it will be like this every time. I will definitely be shopping with them again though and hopefully updating my review then with 5 stars if their service holds true.

Review.Titre: I ordered these parts for my son as a…
Review.Contenu: I ordered these parts for my son as a gift. Excellent buying experience, no complaints. Parts arrived promptly. I wish I could have ordered the parts, paid for them and shipped them directly to my son. But I received a very nice email from customer service saying that unless my son's address was an authorized address on  my credit card, they would not/could not ship to him. So I had the parts shipped to me and then I shipped them to my son. Other than that, shopping was a great experience.

Products are good, emails are quick to respond, lovely amount of stock and quick to restock. However, their website is one of the worst places I've ever encountered. If you can get past their terrible website and included slow response times, then it's a great supply of watercooling and PC components.

Almost everything is great about performancepcs. My 2 complaints are #1 the website can be painfully slow  #2 the shipping cost auto calculate is messed up for PR at least. Sometimes I need a small item which shouldn't be more than $4 or $5 shipping usps yet the system can show as $17...

I am happy with my order and the prices i just wish there was a more economical shipping option as a canadian as i didn't need the item i ordered right away. Not quite sure if ill order again unless i need emergency supplies.

Great site. Has everything I needed, where others did not. However, the only hiccup I found, was my free shipping, had turned to 12 dollar shipping, after I charged my card already. I do not believe this was intentional, and I also didn't care enough to report it. However this is a flaw in the checkout area. The company is very communicative with customers while they await their packages. They have more stock than anyone else online when it comes to water cooling components. I recommend them. At least give them a whirl.

PPCS is my go to for everything when, and if, they have it (the caveat); I can say that, without a doubt, PPCS were instrumental in getting mine, the wife’s PC, off the ground and looking their best. Unfortunately though, there will be times where the inventory will be off which will dictate a change in plans, sometimes drastically and has definitely set me back a few times. That being said, the folks at PPCS will never leave you hanging, communication is tight, shipping is quick, and the product is always solid, and they will work with you.

The site slows down terribly. As it slowed down 5 years ago, it still slows down.Please take action! change hosting and / or make a new, better site. It takes a very long time to load compared to other sites.  Can .. optimize the DB of the product.

I’d love to rate it 5 stars. The shipping time was fairly quick. The shipping cost wasn’t bad. My main concern was packaging. The box came slightly damaged, which could be the carriers fault. But as a guy who like to hold onto boxes for future resale/trades is kind of an inconvenience. Haven’t tested the Radiator yet, but I’m sure it’s just box damage, the Rad looks damage free.Another minor thing, I did wish they sent a separate email for just a receipt link like other sites have; Instead of having to screenshot it from the website. No that easy to find. I could recommend them tho.

I was able to find what I needed but I believe the user interface for navigation and narrowing down search results feels a little clunky. For more experienced PC builders, it’s manageable, but for newbies, I feel that it would make it difficult to find what they needed.

Review.Titre: Great site with a even better…
Review.Contenu: Great site with a even better selection. My only complaint is that the check out can be a big glichy  and gives me the loading circle of death at times. Not sure if its the site or Microsoft edge but have had to resort to the phone to complete an order more then once.
email, don't call.  fast replies to email.  good service, and pretty quick questions answered if you email.  fast shipping.  well recommended.  won't hesitate to buy from them again.

Product is great. I definitely recommend the 80 over the 40, as the 40 version is too small to actually bleed the bubbles.  Performance PCs was one the few sites that could actually deliver the product.  (Nice!) Only issue is that Fed Ex picked up the package it then quickly shipped it back and forth between multiple locations and at one point said they couldn't track it.  A message, even automated from Performance PCs would have alleviated my stress on whether or not there was a real issue from the company side versus Fed Ex shipping being crazy.  I will definitely order from Performance PC again!

Product and shipping were fine. Only issue I had was they priced matched a couple of radiators, then didn't have but one. They refunded the order and I went with a couple of cheaper radiators. I guess I should have just canceled the order and ordered them from the other website which they price matched.I figured they would offer me something....split the difference to a gift card or something. Nothing. :( They also gave me my "reward points" for the original order, then took them back, and have yet to give me the ones for the new order. I thought it would be automatically put on, but I guess not. Overall, happy with everything.

Review.Titre: I was shipped the wrong item
Review.Contenu: I was shipped the wrong item, but I was quickly able to reach their support team. Then they contacted me very promptly and were happy to correct this misunderstanding. The correct item arrived at my house within 2 business day after contacting them.

My experience with Performance PC's covered the whole spectrum of services from ordering to returns.  A large component of my order turned out to be the wrong part.  I searched for a part number and the number I searched for was not in stock.  There was a very like item that was the same part number minus 2 characters.   Both parts look very similar too, a slight diffetence in size.  I didn't notice and ordered the wrong part.  I didn't notice until after I opened the box and attempted to fit the part.  I contacted Performance PC's and explained what I  had done.  They went above and beyond in rectifying the situation.  I applaud the service and would do business with them again.

Ive been a loyal customer for over a decade. Performance PCs have always had what I needed and most of what I've wanted. On top of that, they ship quickly and everything is nice and protected with care; and I appreciate that more than anything else. Especially when it comes to expensive custom loop components. PPC is always my first stop.

I like the selection of items.  I have used Performance-PCS.com for many many years.This time I have to say the shipping was slower than I remember, but it is the holiday season. Not Performance PC’s fault!

Review.Titre: My new favorite online PC store.
Review.Contenu: I decided to shop with performance-pcs due to the recommendation from Jays Two Cents on YouTube rarely has he ever endorsed anything that was unbecoming of the PC enthusiast community. I'm glad I did the products were well packaged, shipped, and delivered as expeditiously as possible. I could tell that they care about the return business and I do intend to return when the time arises.

Review.Titre: fast shipping got it in a week from around the world
Review.Contenu: fast shipping with fair prices for bulk item, great packaging, item came good condition, good place for pc modders.

What can you say about the biggest supplier of pc modding products in the U.S. with superb customer service and regularly takes part in their pc community. Never had issues with them with over 5 years of using their service.

Review.Titre: Best U.S. Based PC Water-cooling Shop
Review.Contenu: Vast array of parts and SKU's, plus great shipping options.  Love this company.

Review.Titre: I needed to replace and buy a water…
Review.Contenu: I needed to replace and buy a water pump, and as fast as possible. Paid 2-3 dollars extra and got the "fast track" treatment. Also paid a little extra for UPS express international. From the states to Danmark in Europe in less than a week. I am very satisfied. Steen, Denmark

The online shopping/checkout was straight forward, the order arrived at the estimated date. The packing was secure and the items perform as expected. This was my first order with Performance PC's. I will be a repeat customer.
All items ordered were packaged carefully and accurately. I had concerns that a 30+ lbs radiator would have a tough transit in shipping but everything came in without a scratch.

Review.Titre: Its exactly what I expected - well done!
Review.Contenu: Well, what can I say. It was quick, I got exactly what I was looking for, and did I mention how quick it was to ship from Florida to Vancouver?

Review.Titre: Always a good place to buy PC…
Review.Contenu: Always a good place to buy PC watercooling parts.
Parts are quality if you problems ask them they respond right away. I bother them all the time with questions delivery is fast even during holidays

Review.Titre: I am a repeat customer, and will continue to be
Review.Contenu: This is a great company, I had always received quality products from this company at a reasonable cost. I interacted with the customer service recently when I had to change my order. I sent an e-mail and called in ~20 min to make sure. Looked like they were already working on it based on my e-mail. I received my stuff as I wanted.

My Heatkiller V Waterblock arrived yesterday in perfect condition for my RTX 4090 FE. Performance PCs is my go-to for accessories and parts to cater to my custom PC watercooling business. I have had only one issue with this company in the past, but the handled the situation with the upmost integrity. They rush ordered me all new replacement parts and called me personally to appologize. Since that incident I have never had another issue and all of my packages have been packaged properly and contain foam peanuts and bubble wrap. Now I am a dedicated customer and wouldn't do business anywhere else! I honestly just wish I had a company discount considering how much I spend there! 🤣😂Great company!

Performance-PCs has always been a wonderful spurce of watercooling equipment. Their customer support is very professional and kind. Their support were super quick in addressing an inventory issue on an order and was able to get it fully resolved in an amazing pace. I will continue giving as much business that I can to Performance-PCs, between their prices and support, they have a customer for life. Thank you again

I previously purchased this product several years ago. Unfortunately it was lost in my recent move. I tried Amazon desperately to re-order but they no longer carry the product. So I researched my purchase more thoroughly and found the name of your company as the manufacturer. Success ! I immediately went to your website...and...found the product I lost. And immediately ordered it. I loved using it in arts & crafts (jewelry) and I found it again. Now I can continue with my arts & crafts projects again. Thank you! Thank you! Thank you! The best product I have ever used.  VKLP
I have never had a bad interaction with PPCS, bought literally 1000's of dollars from them. Well-earned 5 stars.
They had what I needed, and the entire transaction went smoothly.

Review.Titre: Send the shop millions of likes...Perfect
Review.Contenu: In the past, I often bought products from stores on Ebay...this is the first time I have experienced buying directly at the Website...quite interesting, I received many discount codes...easy payment. easy...and enthusiastic staff...I will continue to buy if there is any product I like in this store...thank you very much
Fast shipping, items well packaged and arrived as described

Review.Titre: They have one of the widest range of…
Review.Contenu: They have one of the widest range of Quality products available. They are extremely fast and some of the best prices out there. And as far as companies in the US, I have never had a problem with them getting you what you need or want fast and reliably.
Great holiday sale prices, solid product availability, and super quick shipping. My go to spot for PC water cooling

Review.Titre: Amazingly quick in shipping what I needed.
Review.Contenu: I needed a part for my lianliO11D. I was skeptical at first from ordering it from anywhere buy a big chain store, but Performance PC has won a customer for life. The order went through and item shipped within a few hours and the part arrived earlier than originally stated on the e-mail confirmation for the order. Getting the item was like christmas for me. Thank you.

From shopping to shipment, Performance PCs provides a well priced and reliable order process. There is almost always a sale going on, shipping prices are fair, and they have both mainstream available parts and lesser known brands with new quality products. The website can be a bit overwhelming, but is well worth looking through especially considering how wide the selection is. My orders always shipped the next business day and are packed very well. If I need parts, Performance PCs is on the top of my list.

Review.Titre: There was an issue with my order and…
Review.Contenu: There was an issue with my order and PPCS contacted me and resolved the issu withinan hour. Great service and great communications. I get all of my water cooling parts from PPCS

They were able to make adjustments to my order before it was shipped on the day after a holiday when most places don't even answer the phone.  I will order more from here for sure, thank you again for the great service.
Extremely fast delivery, The shop is very well supplied, more than fair prices and in just  five days (including weekend days) the item has been delivered to the UK.

Review.Titre: Accurate items every time and quick shipping.
Review.Contenu: They have so much variety, some of the things and services they have, you wont find them on Amazon. Can definitely make your build quite unique.

Review.Titre: Quick to ship orders. Very important to me.
Review.Contenu: I have found PerformancPC's always ships my orders in a timely fashion. That is one thing I have appreciated from them for over a decade now.

Back in the day Frozen CPU was the prime choice for custom high end performance PC modification gear especially for liquid cooling.  Since their fall, Performance PCs has assumed that mantle.  If you need the best selection of liquid cooling gear, that’s where you want to shop.
Smooth,easy transaction. Super fast shipping. Good prices. Shipping a bit steep.

Review.Titre: Order was shipped the next day
Review.Contenu: Order was shipped the next day. Only issue I had was with UPS.

Review.Titre: I've been ordering from PPCS for years
Review.Contenu: I've been ordering from PPCS for years. They have the best selection and prices. Orders are shipped quickly and incredably well packaged. Thank you!
My experience with the purchase was perfect and great. I am quite excited.

I love Performane-PC. Had everything I needed for my build at very good prices. Forgot a few fittings and had to place a 2nd order the next day. I got both orders within 3 days! Both orders filled within an hr of ordering and on the road same day! Only issue I had was getting it to accept address when paying. Pro tip: use PayPal! It auto enters info and makes the process seamless.

Guys are legit. Was looking for an obscure upgrade kit for a EKWB AIO 360 CPU Cooler to make it compatible with a LGA 1700 motherboard. EKWB quit making the kits long ago which they sold for $0.01. The only places I could find were either scam sites or scalper sites. These guys had the part. Sold it to me for $0.01 plus shipping. 10/10 Would use again.

Review.Titre: PPCS always comes through for us in a…
Review.Contenu: PPCS always comes through for us in a pinch! Typically, we order manufacturer direct as a reseller, but PPCS has quick shipping and good packaging when in dire need of a product. Their coupon codes and reward points are nice too!

Review.Titre: Trusted first go-to for quality water cooling and customization products.
Review.Contenu: They're responsive and carry a wide range of stock for the items I've needed. I greatly appreciate their team. Whenever I need something for a water cooled rig, I check with Performance PC's first.
They always respond quick and last order changed something on my order no questions asked also have helped my dad on his order that got mixed with someone elses
Got my water block for my gpu at a very good price and it is mint! I was worried about it being damaged but everything is perfect  👌
Good supply of water cooling products. Website is easy to browse and the buying process is straight forward. Products are also shipped very fast, even with the holidays just around the corner.

Review.Titre: The parts I need when I need it and the…
Review.Contenu: The parts I need when I need it and the price is right , shipped quickly and when I forgot a part a quick phone call and they added it to the order with great service.

Review.Titre: Friendly staff and helpful if asked.
Review.Contenu: Very friendly staff and helpful if you ask for it. Prices are right and if you find a better price elsewhere they will try to meet it. I highly recommend performance-pcs.com to my friends and to anyone else!

Awesome experience.  Had an issue with poor internet when placing the order from a hotel, but the staff at Performance PCs was super friendly and confirmed they got the order (and took the time to confirm what I ordered to ensure the order was correct).  I was blown away by the personal touch - nice to see that today. (And the items I ordered were awesome as usual).

Excellent customer service, proactively let me know about a minor issue, and took care of it above my expectations. Good selection of big and small parts, decent prices, and good service. They earned my continued support.
Performance PCs is the fastest-shipping company that I interact with. Everything is packed securely and exactly as described.
I paid extra for rush orders and shipping and got my order well before the expected delivery date. The process is very simple and they almost always have the items I want in stock.

This was the only dealer in the world where I found the "Alphacool Repack Quad Laing DDC", which has actually not been available for purchase for a long time.Price-performance is absolutely excellent, which is why I also ordered four "Laing DDC pump 12V DDC 1T Plus".I can recommend the dealer without reservation.

Great experience with performance PCS as always. I’ve been dealing with them for about 10 years now and I only have good things to say about them. For one anytime I have had any issues they were always quick to reply back to me. Second they carry a wide variety of brand name products ones that I can’t even find in my country. I highly recommend Performance PCS

Review.Titre: Exactly what I ordered came quickly as…
Review.Contenu: Exactly what I ordered came quickly as well

Great prices, robust selection of parts in stock, and an awesome sale for Veteran's Day allowed me to stock up on the majority of my major parts for a water cooling build.  Shipping was quick, inexpensive, and packaging was outstanding.  I will definitely be using Performance PCs for any and all future water cooling needs!

PPCs have always provided exemplary customer service since I've been using the company (about 10 years). I especially love the quick contact for out of stock items or shipping delays, and the bonus gummy bears weren't bad either!Best single source shopping for niche PC cooling items in the US; even more so since the biggest alternate site was run into the ground by the owner a few years back.

Review.Titre: Performance PCs had exactly what I needed!
Review.Contenu: Performance PCs had exactly what I needed!!!   Prices are great, well packaged and quick delivery!!!Few vendors carry Akasa fans, which are great.  Also sold EK 1700 socket upgrade kit for retail (1 cent) and didn’t try to make $10 off of such an important item.  Very satisfied repeat customer!

During the ordering process I created an account but when I paid I used my Amazon Pay credentials and the system placed my order under an account I couldn't access. It was after hours for them so I emailed my issue and they were very understanding and resolved it quickly and apologized for any inconvenience even though they really didn't do anything wrong. There customer service is top notch and very responsive.

Customers service reached out preemptively to fix an order issue. Even with that and the addition of a powdercoat operation on one of my radiators, my order was shipped and delivered to Seattle, WA within just a couple days. Other comparable sellers took multiple weeks to deliver simpler orders.

The customer service over email was extremely fast and helpful. It took a few days for them to make it in the shop, which does take time since its a custom order but when I reached out over email they were fast to respond and made sure to ship out my Lian Li O11 Dynamic frame! If you have any hesitation purchasing from these guys don’t because they won’t disappoint! Thank you again performance pcs!
The attention over the chatIt was amazing! She was able to provide me the help needed to complete everything as expected!

Review.Titre: Great shipping time and even better customer service
Review.Contenu: Great shipping time and even better customer service. Wonderful selection as well. It can be a little frustrating when certain items aren't in stock, but the overall shopping experience is excellent.

I received my package in a very secured and sturdy box. To my surprises, more than half of the box was filled with packing mats covering both of my items (and these are much more durable than bubble wrap!). Shipping was quite fast as well and I was able to receive my item within the next week.

Review.Titre: Shipping was fast and packing was…
Review.Contenu: Shipping was fast and packing was excellent. Can’t recommend Performance PC’s for all your water cooling needs enough. This is the place to buy from.

The ordering process went smoothly. Customer service reached out to notify me that the freebee fitting I had selected with the radiator was out of stock and gave me substitute options. Dealing with customer service was nice, they replied promptly, etc. So no complaints there. Only complaint is that some of the fins on the radiator were bent in a couple different places. Not sure where along the supply chain that happened, but was a bit of a bummer opening the packaging to see that. Overall not a big deal. Good company with responsive staff

Finding the fans I needed, at a very reasonable price, which were not available in my "go to" locations, is what made my experience great. They arrived really quick via UPS and I can honestly say Performance PC is now part of my "go to" list of locations which offer good pricing, reasonable shipping options, and incredible service!

I needed to know if Performance PC's deliver to Australia. I sent an email to their support team and received an email back straight away.Awesome support and great delivery. They had the exact front distro plate that I needed and overall had a great experience. Well recommended!
top notch service for decades. really happy every times. absolute recommendation
Fast international shipping! Ordered from Europe via FedEx took  4  days to reach me! Way to go!
Excellent, shipping was so quick, and I was so excited to get started on water-cooling my old RX 6800 Reference edition. Thank you for fulfilling my project.

Review.Titre: I was made aware of Performance-PC by…
Review.Contenu: I was made aware of Performance-PC by JayzTwoCents. I live about 100 miles from them so I decided to go there myself. They don't sell to the public from their location, but were nice enough to accommodate me then. Since then, I have ordered all my water cooling parts from them. They have everything I need and very fast delivery

Great selection of products, both new and old (some of which are hard to find now). Very reasonable pricing.Order was processed very quickly, and the cheapest international shipping option didn't take long to arrive.Unfortunately, I'm in the UK, so when picking up a few pieces that I have been unable to source in the UK or Europe, postage ends up costing more than the items you have bought, but that's the norm now for international shipping - not PPCs fault. All-in-all, good experience and great service.

Review.Titre: Prompt response to an ordering issue…
Review.Contenu: Prompt response to an ordering issue which was swiftly fixed, overkill packaging as well.

I thought I was out of luck since I had misplaced the mount needed for an old long discontinued cooler I had. Managed to find it in stock here, but was skeptical since some sites have obscure old items still up but not in stock. I was pleasantly surprised when it shipped first thing the next day. I think it would have even shipped the same day had I ordered a little earlier. Really appreciate niche places like this still going in the age of amazon and newegg.
Great customer service. Almost anything you're looking  for and quick shipping!

Review.Titre: Great products, great prices and great customer service.
Review.Contenu: They have a great selection of product at good prices.  They answer any questions I have and if there is ever a problem with an order, they will take care of it promptly.
I appreciate how easy it is to navigate Performace PC's website. I also like how it indicates whether a part is in stock and the option to be notified when it becomes available.

I ordered a few water cooling pieces for my PC and one of the parts i ordered was actually out of stock. When they discovered this error they called me and asked if i wanted to chose a different color or get a refund. They also ship very quickly. My order was shipped next day and arrived 2 days later. I love a company that values their costumers this way and will definitely be shopping with them again

Review.Titre: One of the if not the best in the states
Review.Contenu: Always have some of the best prices and packaging. Never had an item damaged in shipping. Quick turn around times and a wide selection of quality components.

Review.Titre: A+ Selection and amazing Customer Service!
Review.Contenu: Great selection of items when it comes to customizing your PC. Amazing customer service and shipping was great as well. Received my items quickly and packaging was above and beyond great. Will shop here again.

Review.Titre: Best online shopping experience I've had
Review.Contenu: Extremely fast shipping.  The customer support is top tier.  I requested a very specific $400 component that was not in stock, and in a couple days I received an email that they restocked the product for me.

Review.Titre: Highly recommended for custom PC users.
Review.Contenu: Like working with a classic, back in the day parts vendor.  Polite and friendly customer service with a rather wide range of PC/water cooling products.  Shipping is always on point with some of the best packaging I've seen to date.

Review.Titre: Holding one of the widest selections
Review.Contenu: Holding one of the widest selections of PC hardware, as well as some stock like watercooling being very niche even carries some of the hardest parts to obtain from overseas. Shipping and overall quality of my experience was well welcomed and appreciated.

Review.Titre: Fantastic company to work with great…

They have a great selection and the prices are usually very competitive. I also prefer to give my money to businesses with an active interest in the hobby, as opposed to a giant corporation.

Review.Titre: Fantastic product selection at a great…
Review.Contenu: Fantastic product selection at a great price. Shipping was quick. Any products that are out of stock they are quick to restock.
Orders were handled professionally and quickly.A pleasure doing business with you.
Great followup on questions.  Change order and was done.  Quick shipping.
Performance PCs stocks a lot of less commonly found items and I have always had a good experience shopping there.

Review.Titre: Large variety of harder to find items
Review.Contenu: I really wanted green cablemod cables for my build especially the sata data and sata power ones, but no one seemed to have them anywhere. I stumbled on Performance PCs and they had all the cables in stock that I wanted and more. Shipping was fast and overall a great experience.
Fast and efficient. I ordered my item, it was quickly shipped and I received on time. Pleasure to do business with
My order arrived three days ahead of expectation. They must of processed it quickly for it to travel to western Washington in four days.
Multiple orders, fast shipping, honest people, this is your one stop shop.
Great selection, shipping was super quick and each time I reach out to support, the experience is great. Website is somewhat clunky to navigate though.

Review.Titre: They sell quality products at a fair…

Really like using this store they have a lot of things that I can't get here in Australia and the shipping times are really fast, really nice people to deal with too if you have a problem or need to know anything

Review.Titre: Fast shipping and excellent customer service
Review.Contenu: Fast shipping and excellent customer service. I needed my parts in 24 hours and the customer service rep I talked to handled my shipment personally. I will absolutely shop here in the future.

Review.Titre: They have a great selection and always…
Review.Contenu: They have a great selection and always have what I am looking for, especially when other vendors do not. I have been in an out for years and they never disappoint.

Review.Contenu: This seller sells quickly and quickly.The buyer has to do is wait and see when the delivery will arrive.

Review.Titre: Great options and better prices than…
Review.Contenu: Great options and better prices than some of the manufacturers they sell products of

I had ordered 2 boxes of fittings. They gave me a call about 30 minutes after I ordered and let me know that they only had 1 of the box of fittings. I was offered a refund or to get box of similar fittings. I appreciate how quick they were to let me know and how nice they were over the phone. Great people and great service!
